markdownRemark.html:
I’m participating in the Advent of Code this year. It’s a programming challenge released each day for the first 25 days of december. In 2018, I completed all problems within 24 hours of being released (including the notorious day 15); I hope to repeat that performance this year. Check out my solutions on github or join the event yourself.

Update 2019-12-26: I’ve completed all 50 stars and even landed on the global leaderboard once. It was a blast. Check out my writeups for the event and each problem in my AoC repository.

frontmatter.title: Connect to Phoenix channels using React and Typescript
